section:
Wishport is a picturesque town set at the back of a bay rimmed by white cliffs. Fish, oil, dyes and other commodities are packed here for transport inland.
You can buy a town house here for 100 Shards. If you decide to, cross off the money and put a tick in the box by the town house option.
